description: Front porch; first floor side extension; rear dormer; roof lights in front and side roof slopes; external alterations
decision_conditions: <p><span style="line-height: normal;">The proposed rear dormer's bulk and siting close to the roof verge would result in a disproportionate addition to the dwelling house which would fail to be visually contained within the roof slope and fail to respect the character and appearance of the dwelling house&nbsp;and pattern of development in the street&nbsp;contrary to the high quality design aspirations of the National Planning Policy Framework (2023), Policy D3 D(7) and D(11) of The&nbsp; London Plan (2021), Core Policy CS1.B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012), Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013) and the adopted Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Design Guide (2010).</span><br></p>

<p>The proposed single storey side extension and resulting roof alterations would result in a disproportionate addition to the dwelling house which would dominate and subsume the character and appearance of the existing dwellinghouse and fail to respect the scale of the neighbouring dwelling houses and pattern of development in the locality,&nbsp;<span style="line-height: normal;">contrary to the high quality design aspirations of the National Planning Policy Framework (2023), Policy D3 D(7) and D(11) of The&nbsp; London Plan (2021), Core Policy CS1.B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012), Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013) and the adopted Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Design Guide (2010).</span><br></p>
